    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40cf0ae9-90c8-42d6-242c-b1484a3ed719#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Pol, Jan és Herman Limbourg: Berry herceg hóráskönyve.</string>
            <string language="en">Pol, Jan and Herman Limbourg: Duke Berry's Book of Hours</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Pol, Jan. und Herman Limbourg: Herzog Berrys
Book von Stunden</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pôle, janv. et Herman Limbourg : Book de 
duc Berry's des heures</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pol, janeiro e Herman Limbourg: Livro do 
duque Baga das horas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Pol, gennaio e Herman Limbourg: Book del 
duca Berry delle ore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">POL, Limbourg του Ιαν. και Herman: Βιβλίο 
του μούρου δουκών των ωρών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Pol, enero y Herman Limbourg: Book de duque 
Berry's de horas</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">január, május.</string>
            <string language="en">January, May</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Berry herceg,  illuminátor,  hóráskönyv,  Limbourg-fivérek,  Jan, Pol és Herman Limbourg,  hónapábrázolások,  zodiákus-jegyek,  </string>
            <string language="en">Duke Berry, illuminator, Book pf Hours, Limbourg Brothers, Jan, Pol and Herman Limbourg, representations of the months, signs of the zodiac</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Januar, Mai</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Janvier, Mai</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Janeiro, Maio</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gennaio, Maggio</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μάιος Ιανουαρίου,</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Enero, Mayo</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Herzog Berry, Belichtungseinheit, Stunden des Buch-PF, 
Limbourg Brüder, Jan., Pol und Herman Limbourg, Darstellungen der 
Monate, Zeichen des Tierkreises</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Duc Berry, bloc d'éclairage, heures du livre pf, 
frères de Limbourg, janv., Pôle et Herman Limbourg, représentations
des mois, signes du zodiaque</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Duque Baga, iluminador, de pf do livro horas, irmãos de
Limbourg, janeiro, Pol e Herman Limbourg, respresentações dos meses,
sinais do zodiac</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Duca Berry, lampadina, ore del libro pf, fratelli di 
Limbourg, gennaio, Pol e Herman Limbourg, rappresentazioni dei mesi, 
segni dello zodiac</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μούρου δουκών, φωτιστικό, ώρες βιβλίων pf, αδελφοί του 
Limbourg, Limbourg του Ιαν., POL και Herman, 
αντιπροσωπεύσεις των μηνών, σημάδια zodiac</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Duque Berry, iluminador, horas del pf del libro, 
hermanos de Limbourg, enero, Pol y Herman Limbourg, representaciones 
de los meses, muestras del zodiaco</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
